website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy TabPro S is an incredibly slim, eye-catching Windows 10 tablet with best-in-class battery life, but its features and overall performance don't quite justify the fairly steep price.
cons: Intel Core m3 processor can't match the performance Core m7 and Core i5 CPUs in competing systems
One port, and it's USB-C with no Thunderbolt compatibility
Lacks a stylus and expansion slots

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Not just the best tablet but also on balance the best notebook/laptop that I've owned in 20 years including top of the range Dell XPS. Just don't expect massive processor speed or memory or high quality exported video. Make sure you purchase port expansion adaptor. Works well on wireless with other Samsung products ie. smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisen

customer_reviews.title: Failed after  a year
customer_reviews.text: The tablet started to glitch after a year of very moderate use. I can't switch it at all as it shows blank page and reboot warning ...press any key.. but the keys don't respond at all. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powering up this device
customer_reviews.text: Used the supplies charger and USB cable cannot get any initial charge into this device, about as useful as a "chocolate fire guard". Trawling the net there appears to be a generic problem. This was not highlighted in your previous posted reviews wonder why?????
customer_reviews.author: Denis Fountain

customer_reviews.title: I'm absolutely satisfied. Using it to perform music sheets by an ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely satisfied. Using it to perform music sheets by an app " Mobile Sheet " working perfect. What I'm missing is a european charger ( delivered with a english standard stick. Using an adapter and it is tricky. Happy new year to you GF
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Ferenczi

customer_reviews.title: My warranty won't cover the problem of tablet not turning ...
customer_reviews.text: My warranty won't cover the problem of tablet not turning on £900 tech shark won't reply Amazon said get in touch with bank .Don't touch
customer_reviews.author: Catherine grinter

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is really brilliant. It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is really brilliant. It works like a charm, and the screen is just amazing. It's not cheap but it worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Zsofinyecz

customer_reviews.title: Go TabPro!!
customer_reviews.text: I moved up from the Galaxy Tab 10.1 to this beast. And there are no comparisons to them. The TabPro is AWESOME. Easy set up. Easy to use. Great graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Zanzibarbarian

customer_reviews.title: apart from a few issues i love
customer_reviews.text: First tablet i can run my business on, apart from a few issues i love it
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mc

customer_reviews.title: As I said it is very good. It seems quite a fast tablet to me
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my needs. I have a library of books on it that cross reference each other. I have a Bluetooth mouse for it. I had problems connecting the Bluetooth mouse to it. It was entirely my fault because I did not realise that I had to press certain buttons together on the mouse for it to connect to the tablet. I just wrote this note to help anyone else that might have similar problems. There were no problems with the Samsung tablet at all. As I said it is very good. It seems quite a fast tablet to me. It is obviously not a games machine.
customer_reviews.author: R A Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good piece of equipment, and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: John Lewington

customer_reviews.title: Could not power on after updates
customer_reviews.text: After the Windows and Samsung updates the tablet did not power on no matter what combination of keys I pressed. Apparently a frequent issue for this tablet as I discovered on Samsung US forums. I returned the product to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MDRO74

customer_reviews.title: Not working after only a few months!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the product started to suffer from sever problems of switch on. It became impossible to switch on the tablet even if fully charged. If you call the customer support they are just asking you information you can only give if your tabled is switched on so they don't even understand your problem. Totally useless product!
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life, only ONE USB-C connection, battery discharges when turned off. I regret this purchase, should have gone for the surface pro. I really wouldn't bother getting this, unless it goes sub £500
customer_reviews.author: Steve Millam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the seal on the Samsung box was broken. I returned it immeidately.
customer_reviews.author: JBE

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tabpro
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Seals on box containing tablet and side of box broken. It tells you not to use if the seals are broken. So I did not even try it just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Southwestbelle

product_meta.title: Samsung S series SM-W703 0.9GHz m3-6Y30 12" 2160 x 1440pixels Touchscreen Black
product_meta.description:
Finally, a tablet designed for todayÆs business.

Achieve more in your working day with the Galaxy TabPro S. ItÆs the 2in1 tablet thatÆs ready to do business the way you want to. It gives you the tools to work on your terms. It fuses the business performance you need from a laptop with the ease-of-use you want from a tablet.

ItÆs Pro Performance

Demand the best for your business. The Intel Core M processor means the TabPro S is ready to get down to serious business. With rapid charging, long battery life, speedy data transfer and Windows 10 Pro out of the box, you can ensure youÆre ready for every eventuality.

ItÆs Pro Business

The Galaxy TabPro S is truly professional. With security from Windows and an optional C-type pen for quick note taking, itÆs more than a 2in1 tablet. ItÆs the confidence that you can access your information whenever you need to.

ItÆs Pro Anywhere

The Galaxy TabPro S works wherever your work takes you. It features a full-sized detachable keyboard cover and 12ö sAMOLED screen, so you can connect to your business wherever you are.


Main Features
